titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of S. 2328.
Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of S. 2328.

action.text: Mr. Bishop (UT) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of S. 2328 to change the title to read "An Act to establish an Oversight Board to assist the Government of Puerto Rico, including instrumentalities, in managing its public finances, and for other purposes."
